entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:36 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 6:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
